Message:
As everyone’s leader,
I can’t fold here.

But...is using force
really the only way...?

It was as though Nebra could
see right through me,
straight to the doubts in my heart.

“You don’t have to do
everything on your own.
I’m here, too, remember?”

Suddenly, I felt as if I was
looking at the Nebra I knew
when we were younger.

That’s right... Nebra has
always been beside me.

That’s why I was
able to make it this far...

I can’t shine a light
through the darkness
of this world by myself.
But, with the two of us
standing as one...!

To negotiate as soon as possible,
I left the stronghold
in my comrades’ care.
I then headed for
the humans’ meeting place...

This place was built by a lake,
so it’s eerily quiet...
Not only that, but Nebra
should’ve been here by now.
Where could she...?
